Package jdr.generator.api.characters

Class FreepikService

java.lang.Object
jdr.generator.api.characters.FreepikService
@Service("freepikService") public class FreepikService extends Object
Service for interacting with the Freepik API for character generation and statistics.

  • Method Details

    • generateIllustrationAsync

      @Async protected CompletableFuture<Void> generateIllustrationAsync(IllustrationDrawStyle promptDrawStyle, CharacterDetailsEntity detailsEntity)
      Asynchronously generates an illustration for a character using the Freepik API.
      Parameters:
      promptDrawStyle - The key and prompt defining the overall portrait style to generate
      detailsEntity - The details of the character for whom to generate the illustration.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture representing the completion of the asynchronous operation.

    • illustrate

      public byte[] illustrate(String promptPortrait)
      Generates an image based on the provided prompt using the Freepik API.
      Parameters:
      promptPortrait - The complete prompt for the image generation.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the generated image, or null if an error occurs.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error communicating with the Freepik API.

    • regenerateIllustration

      public byte[] regenerateIllustration(Long id, String newDrawStyle)
      Regenerates an illustration for an existing character based on its stored details.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character for which to regenerate the illustration.
      newDrawStyle - An optional new drawing style to use for the illustration. If null or empty,
      Returns:
      An array of bytes representing the regenerated image.
